  • すべてのスーパーインタフェース:
    ComponentConfigurationDeclarer<LinearDRPCInputDeclarer>, ResourceDeclarer<LinearDRPCInputDeclarer>

    public interface LinearDRPCInputDeclarer
extends ComponentConfigurationDeclarer<LinearDRPCInputDeclarer>
